UniprotID	O43291
Accession	O43291;A8K667;B4DLU1;O00271;O14895;Q5TZQ3;Q969E0
EntryName	SPIT2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Kunitz-type protease inhibitor 2 (Hepatocyte growth factor activator inhibitor type 2) (HAI-2) (Placental bikunin)
GeneName	SPINT2 HAI2 KOP
Length	252
Function	Inhibitor of HGFAC (PubMed:9346890). Also inhibits plasmin, and plasma and tissue kallikrein (PubMed:9115294). Inhibits serine protease activity of TMPRSS13 (PubMed:20977675, PubMed:28710277). Inhibits serine protease activity of ST14/matriptase and PRSS8/prostasin in vitro (PubMed:28710277, PubMed:30445423).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane; Cytoplasm
